Description: Fragment of linen and tapestry; decoration of 8 pointed star with two concentric circles in the middle with interlacing floral motifs, in each point of the star are floral motifs (vine leaves); plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/24), weft-undyed linen (S/14); tapestry: warp-undyed linen (2-4 grouped threads/8 ribs per cm), weft-dark blue wool (S/56); 'flying thread' brocading- undyed linen (S); no edges preserved
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
